heading: Expert Presenters
content: We expect to have speakers on topics ranging from trading card grading, comic book collecting, and all the way to 3D printing.

heading: Live 3D Printing
content: Many experts and enthusiasts will be setting up their 3D printing gear for live printing demonstrations.  Questions and conversations are welcome!

heading: Breakout RPG Gaming
content: Ever wanted to try and dip your toe into the world of role playing games? Already an active RPG participant? We will have many rooms available with ongoing games to get you set up and going!

heading: Raffle Giveaway
content: There is no price to pay, only opportunities to get more tickets: be one of the first 20 attendees to RSVP, attend a talk, play an RPG game. There are so many ways to get another chance to win!
